updates.description: This update introduced new API endpoints that allow third-party applications to access account balances, transaction history, and investment performance data. It also provides more granular control over user permissions and data access.
updates.automation_value: The new API capabilities can automate data retrieval and analysis tasks, reducing manual work and saving time for users.
updates.business_impact: This update can improve efficiency by automating data retrieval and analysis tasks, which can lead to significant time savings and improved accuracy.

updates.description: This suite offers a set of tools for automating common tasks such as account reconciliation, portfolio rebalancing, and report generation. It also includes a visual workflow designer that allows users to create custom automation workflows.
updates.automation_value: The Workflow Automation Suite can significantly reduce the time spent on routine tasks and eliminate manual errors, improving efficiency and accuracy.
updates.business_impact: This suite can streamline routine tasks, reducing manual work and errors, leading to improved efficiency and accuracy.

updates.description: This update enables seamless integration with Salesforce, allowing users to access and update Fidelity data directly from the Salesforce interface. It also includes automatic data synchronization between the two platforms.
updates.automation_value: The integration can automate data transfer between Fidelity and Salesforce, eliminating the need for manual data entry and reducing the risk of data inconsistencies.
updates.business_impact: This integration can improve data consistency and reduce manual data entry, leading to time savings and improved data accuracy.

updates.description: This update introduced several time-saving features such as bulk transaction processing, pre-filled forms based on historical data, and one-click report generation.
updates.automation_value: These features can save users time by automating repetitive tasks and reducing the need for manual data entry.
updates.business_impact: These features can improve efficiency by reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks and manual data entry, leading to significant time savings.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Fidelity API v2.0
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: This update introduced new API endpoints that allow third-party applications to access account balances, transaction history, and investment performance data. It also provides more granular control over user permissions and data access.
   Automation Value: The new API capabilities can automate data retrieval and analysis tasks, reducing manual work and saving time for users.

2. Update Name: Fidelity Workflow Automation Suite
   Release Date: March 2024
   Description: This suite offers a set of tools for automating common tasks such as account reconciliation, portfolio rebalancing, and report generation. It also includes a visual workflow designer that allows users to create custom automation workflows.
   Automation Value: The Workflow Automation Suite can significantly reduce the time spent on routine tasks and eliminate manual errors, improving efficiency and accuracy.

3. Update Name: Fidelity Integration with Salesforce
   Release Date: July 2024
   Description: This update enables seamless integration with Salesforce, allowing users to access and update Fidelity data directly from the Salesforce interface. It also includes automatic data synchronization between the two platforms.
   Automation Value: The integration can automate data transfer between Fidelity and Salesforce, eliminating the need for manual data entry and reducing the risk of data inconsistencies.

4. Update Name: Fidelity Time-Saving Features
   Release Date: January 2025
   Description: This update introduced several time-saving features such as bulk transaction processing, pre-filled forms based on historical data, and one-click report generation.
   Automation Value: These features can save users time by automating repetitive tasks and reducing the need for manual data entry.
